replies.body:
So there's no 6300IP Champion on sale this week?
So next set of sales we should get two 6300IP Champions on sale then?

Hey NZ SnowCat,
We have just added Hecarim into the sales pool to give you a 6300IP/975RP Champion on sale.
Is it just me or is the sale not updated on the client?
In my client thr sale hasn't been updated yet, is it only me ?
Oh look two skins I really like on sale. Oh wait I already spent all my money on the new Ahri skin...
I need some more Rp to buy nocturne and I really want him and I can't buy more. It takes forever to get enough ip
{{summoner:9}} this is a new summoner spell
lol at least there's four on sale now.......lol I wish the next ones would be on the 6300 level
Why can't you guys make an IP sale some time :/

Hey Guys,
The sales are all now showing correctly.
sejuani is still showing up as 487RP when she should be 440RP

> [{quoted}](name=wlfnddl,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=OwXuWqpw,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2015-01-20T02:41:45.318+0000)
>
> sejuani is still showing up as 487RP when she should be 440RP

The change to the correct price has been submitted. It might take a little while to show correctly though. It appears the DNS cache is taking a little longer than normal to update.
Just Bought Steel Legion {{champion:86}} Pretty Good Skin

Hey GUys,
Im working on this atm, in my tools its telling me they are active and up but I can see they are not showing in the client, so I'm trying to figure out what is going on.
The sales are not on my client yet. help{{champion:32}}
